trans-unit.source: The colors are specified as a set of ColorGradientStop child items, each of which defines a position on the gradient from 0.0 to 1.0 and a color. The position of each ColorGradientStop is defined by setting its position property; its color is defined using its color property.
trans-unit.target: 颜色被指定为一组ColorGradientStop子项，每个子项都定义了从0.0到1.0的渐变上的位置以及一种颜色。每个ColorGradientStop的位置是通过设置其position属性来定义的；其颜色是使用其color属性定义的。

trans-unit.source: The colors are specified as a set of GradientStop child items, each of which defines a position on the gradient from 0.0 to 1.0 and a color. The position of each GradientStop is defined by setting its position property; its color is defined using its color property.
trans-unit.target: 颜色被指定为一组GradientStop子项，每个子项定义了渐变上从0.0到1.0的位置以及一种颜色。每个GradientStop的位置是通过设置其position属性来定义的；其颜色是使用其color属性定义的。

trans-unit.source: The colors in a gradient are defined using stop points of the QGradientStop type; i.e., a position and a color. Use the setColorAt() function to define a single stop point. Alternatively, use the setStops() function to define several stop points in one go. Note that the latter function
trans-unit.target: 渐变中的颜色是使用QGradientStop类型的停止点定义的；即位置和颜色。使用setColorAt（）函数定义单个停止点。或者，使用setStops（）函数一次性定义多个停止点。注意后一个功能

trans-unit.source: The colors in a gradient is defined using stop points of the QGradientStop type, i.e. a position and a color. Use the QGradient::setColorAt() or the QGradient::setStops() function to define the stop points. It is the gradient's complete set of stop points that describes how the gradient area should be filled. If no stop points have been specified, a gradient of black at 0 to white at 1 is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用QGradientStop类型的停止点（即位置和颜色）定义渐变中的颜色。使用QGradient :: setColorAt（）或QGradient :: setStops（）函数来定义停止点。渐变的完整停止点集描述了如何填充渐变区域。如果未指定任何停止点，则使用0处黑色到1处白色的渐变。

trans-unit.source: The colors in an image's color table are specified as ARGB quadruplets (QRgb). Use the qAlpha(), qRed(), qGreen(), and qBlue() functions to get the color value components.
trans-unit.target: 图像颜色表中的颜色指定为ARGB四倍体（QRgb）。使用qAlpha（），qRed（），qGreen（）和qBlue（）函数来获取颜色值分量。

trans-unit.source: The colors in the gradient() all have an alpha component that is 255.
trans-unit.target: 渐变（）中的颜色都有一个255的alpha分量。

trans-unit.source: The column categories of the mapping. Only items with column role values that are found in this list are included when the data is resolved. The columns are ordered in the same order as they are in this list.

trans-unit.source: The command is useful when some snippet of commands or text is to be used in multiple places in the documentation. Use the \include command wherever you want to insert a snippet into the documentation. The file containing the snippet to include must be located under the path(s) listed in the sourcedirs QDoc configuration variable. It can be either any source file parsed by QDoc (or even the same one where \include command is used), or any other text file. To store snippets in a separate file that is not meant to be parsed by QDoc, use a file extension that is not listed in sources.fileextensions; for example, .qdocinc.
trans-unit.target: 当在文档中的多个位置使用一些命令或文本片段时，该命令很有用。要将\ snippet插入文档的任何地方，请使用\ include命令。包含要包含的代码段的文件必须位于sourcedirs QDoc配置变量中列出的路径下。它可以是QDoc解析的任何源文件（甚至可以是使用\ include命令的源文件），也可以是任何其他文本文件。要将代码片段存储在QDoc不会解析的单独文件中，请使用sources.fileextensions中未列出的文件扩展名。例如 .qdocinc 。

trans-unit.source: The command is useful when some snippet of commands or text is to be used in multiple places in the documentation. It can be either any source file parsed by QDoc (or even the same one where \include command is used), or any other text file. To store snippets in a separate file that is not meant to be parsed by QDoc, use a file extension that is not listed in sources.fileextensions; for example, .qdocinc.

trans-unit.source: The command link is a new control that was introduced by Windows Vista. Its intended use is similar to that of a radio button in that it is used to choose between a set of mutually exclusive options. Command link buttons should not be used by themselves but rather as an alternative to radio buttons in Wizards and dialogs and makes pressing the "next" button redundant. The appearance is generally similar to that of a flat pushbutton, but it allows for a descriptive text in addition to the normal button text. By default it will also carry an arrow icon, indicating that pressing the control will open another window or page.
trans-unit.target: 命令链接是Windows Vista引入的一个新控件。它的用途类似于单选按钮,用于在一组相互排斥的选项之间进行选择。命令链接按钮不应该单独使用,而是作为向导和对话框中单选按钮的替代品,并使按 "下一个 "按钮成为多余。其外观一般与扁平按钮相似,但它除了正常的按钮文字外,还允许有描述性的文字。默认情况下,它还会带有一个箭头图标,表示按下该控件将打开另一个窗口或页面。

trans-unit.source: The command must stand on its own line. See Qt Sensors QML Types for an example. The page is generated from qtsensors5.qdoc. There you will find a qdoc comment containing the \qmlmodule command for the QtSensors module. The same qdoc comment contains two \annotated-list commands to list the QML types in two separate groups. The QML types have been divided into these two groups because it makes more sense to list them this way than it does to list them in a single alphabetical list. At the bottom of the comment, \noautolist has been used to tell qdoc not to generate the automatic annotated list.
trans-unit.target: 该命令必须独立运行。有关示例，请参见Qt传感器QML类型。该页面是从 qtsensors5.qdoc 生成的。在那里，您将找到一个包含QtSensors模块 \qmlmodule 命令的qdoc​​注释。相同的qdoc​​注释包含两个 \annotated-list 命令，以在两个单独的组中列出QML类型。 QML类型已分为两组，因为以这种方式列出它们比在单个字母列表中列出更有意义。在注释的底部，已使用 \noautolist 告诉qdoc不要生成自动注释列表。

trans-unit.source: The component instance scope hierarchy extends to out-of-line components, too. In the following example, the TitlePage.qml component creates two TitleText instances. trans-unit.source: The configuration file can specify the preferred style (may be overridden by either of the methods described earlier) and certain style-specific attributes. The following example specifies that the preferred style is the Material style.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件可以指定首选样式(可以被前面描述的任何一种方法覆盖)和某些特定样式的属性。下面的例子指定了首选样式是Material样式。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file can specify the preferred style and certain style-specific attributes. The following example specifies that the preferred style is the Material style. Furthermore, when the application is run with the Material style, its theme is light and the accent and primary colors are teal and blue grey, respectively. However, if the application is run with the Universal style instead, the accent color is red and the appropriate theme is chosen based on the system theme colors.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件可以指定首选样式和某些样式特定的属性。下面的示例指定首选样式为Material样式。此外，当应用程序以“材质”样式运行时，其主题为浅色，强调色和原色分别为蓝绿色和蓝灰色。但是，如果应用程序改用通用样式运行，则强调色为红色，并根据系统主题色选择适当的主题。

trans-unit.source: The configuration is a placeholder which will be resolved to an actual configuration by the platform when a session is opened. Depending on the platform the selection may generate a popup dialog asking the user for his preferred choice.

trans-unit.source: The configuration is based on a group of QNetworkConfigurations of type InternetAccessPoint. All group members can reach the same target network. This type of configuration is a mandatory requirement for roaming enabled network sessions. On some platforms this form of configuration may also be called Service Network Access Point (SNAP).
trans-unit.target: 该配置基于一组类型为InternetAccessPoint的QNetworkConfigurations。所有组成员都可以到达同一个目标网络。这种类型的配置是启用漫游的网络会话的强制性要求。在某些平台上,这种形式的配置也可以称为服务网络接入点(SNAP)。

trans-unit.source: The configuration is currently used by an open network session (see QNetworkSession::isOpen()). However this does not mean that the current process is the entity that created the open session. It merely indicates that if a new QNetworkSession were to be constructed based on this configuration QNetworkSession::state() would return QNetworkSession::Connected. This state implies the QNetworkConfiguration::Discovered state.
trans-unit.target: 当前，开放网络会话使用该配置（请参见QNetworkSession :: isOpen（））。但是，这并不意味着当前进程是创建打开会话的实体。它仅表示如果要基于此配置构造新的QNetworkSession，则QNetworkSession :: state（）将返回QNetworkSession :: Connected。此状态暗示QNetworkConfiguration :: Discovered状态。

trans-unit.source: The connection parameters influence how often a master and a slave device synchronize with each other. In general, a lower connection interval and latency means faster communication, but also higher power consumption. How these criteria should be weighed against each other is highly dependent on the concrete use case.
trans-unit.target: 连接参数影响主设备和从设备之间同步的频率。一般来说,较低的连接间隔和延迟意味着更快的通信,但也意味着更高的功耗。如何权衡这些标准,在很大程度上取决于具体的用例。

trans-unit.source: The connection type can be specified by passing an additional argument to connect(). Be aware that using direct connections when the sender and receiver live in different threads is unsafe if an event loop is running in the receiver's thread, for the same reason that calling any function on an object living in another thread is unsafe.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过向connect（）传递附加参数来指定连接类型。请注意，如果在接收者线程中运行事件循环，则在发送者和接收者生活在不同线程中时使用直接连接是不安全的，其原因与在居住在另一个线程中的对象上调用任何函数是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: The console-oriented platform plugins like eglfs and linuxfb install signal handlers by default to capture interrupt (SIGINT), suspend and continue (SIGTSTP, SIGCONT) and termination (SIGTERM). This way the keyboard, terminal cursor, and possibly other graphics state can be restored when the application terminates or gets suspended due to kill, or Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Z. (although terminating or suspending via the keyboard is only possible when QT_QPA_ENABLE_TERMINAL_KEYBOARD is set, as outlined above in the Input section). However, in some cases capturing SIGINT can be undesirable as it may conflict with remote debugging for instance. Therefore, the environment variable QT_QPA_NO_SIGNAL_HANDLER is provided to opt out from all built-in signal handling.
trans-unit.target: 面向控制台的平台插件（例如eglfs和linuxfb）默认情况下会安装信号处理程序，以捕获中断（ SIGINT ），挂起并继续（ SIGTSTP ， SIGCONT ）和终止（ SIGTERM ）。这样，当应用程序由于 kill 或 Ctrl+C 或 Ctrl+Z 而终止或被挂起时，可以恢复键盘，终端光标以及可能的其他图形状态。 （尽管仅在设置了 QT_QPA_ENABLE_TERMINAL_KEYBOARD 时，才可以通过键盘终止或挂起，如上面“输入”部分所述）。但是，在某些情况下，捕获 SIGINT 可能是不可取的，因为它可能与例如远程调试冲突。因此，提供了环境变量 QT_QPA_NO_SIGNAL_HANDLER 以选择退出所有内置信号处理。

trans-unit.source: The container classes are implicitly shared, they are reentrant, and they are optimized for speed, low memory consumption, and minimal inline code expansion, resulting in smaller executables. In addition, they are thread-safe in situations where they are used as read-only containers by all threads used to access them.
trans-unit.target: 容器类是隐式共享的，它们是可重入的，并且已针对速度，低内存消耗和最小的内联代码扩展进行了优化，从而生成了较小的可执行文件。此外，在所有用于访问它们的线程都将它们用作只读容器的情况下，它们是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: The container classes are implicitly shared, they are reentrant, and they are optimized for speed, low memory consumption, and minimal inline code expansion, resulting in smaller executables. In addition, they are thread-safe in situations where they are used as read-only containers by all threads used to access them.
trans-unit.target: 容器类是隐式共享的，它们是可重入的，并且已针对速度，低内存消耗和最小的内联代码扩展进行了优化，从而生成了较小的可执行文件。此外，在所有用于访问它们的线程都将它们用作只读容器的情况下，它们是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: The container classes are implicitly shared, they are reentrant, and they are optimized for speed, low memory consumption, and minimal inline code expansion, resulting in smaller executables. In addition, they are thread-safe in situations where they are used as read-only containers by all threads used to access them.
trans-unit.target: 容器类是隐式共享的，它们是可重入的，并且已针对速度，低内存消耗和最小的内联代码扩展进行了优化，从而生成了较小的可执行文件。此外，在所有用于访问它们的线程都将它们用作只读容器的情况下，它们是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: The container itself is not copied before iterating over it.
trans-unit.target: 容器本身在迭代之前不会被复制。

trans-unit.target: 容器接过来的所有权

trans-unit.target: 容器的数据必须在这个字节数组视图对象的生命周期内保持有效。

trans-unit.source: The containers are defined in individual header files with the same name as the container (e.g., <QLinkedList>). For convenience, the containers are forward declared in <QtContainerFwd>.
trans-unit.target: 容器在单独的头文件中定义，并与容器具有相同的名称（例如 <QLinkedList> ）。为了方便起见，在 <QtContainerFwd> 中对容器进行了前向声明。

trans-unit.source: The containers are defined in individual header files with the same name as the container (e.g., <QList>). For convenience, the containers are forward declared in <QtContainerFwd>.
trans-unit.target: 容器在单独的头文件中定义，并与容器具有相同的名称（例如 <QList> ）。为了方便起见，在 <QtContainerFwd> 中对容器进行了前向声明。

trans-unit.source: The containers provide iterators for traversal. STL-style iterators are the most efficient ones and can be used together with Qt's and STL's generic algorithms. Java-style Iterators are provided for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 容器提供遍历的迭代器。STL样式的迭代器是最高效的迭代器，可以与Qt和STL的通用算法一起使用。提供Java样式的迭代器是为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: The content context can be of any type storable in a QVariant. The value of the content context is not intended to be used directly by applications.
trans-unit.target: 内容上下文可以是QVariant中可存储的任何类型。内容上下文的值不打算由应用程序直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The content context is used by backends to store additional content context related to the content request. Other relevant fields should also be filled in. For example, if the content request is for image content the content type should also be set with setContentType(). The content context allows additional context to be kept which is not directly accessible via the Qt Location API.
trans-unit.target: 后端使用内容上下文来存储与内容请求相关的其他内容上下文。其他相关字段也应填写。例如，如果内容请求是针对图像内容，则还应使用setContentType（）设置内容类型。内容上下文允许保留无法通过Qt Location API直接访问的其他上下文。

trans-unit.source: The content is stored as a QPlaceContent::Collection which contains both the index of the content, as well as the content itself. This enables developers to check whether a particular item has already been retrieved and if not, then request that content.
trans-unit.target: 内容存储为QPlaceContent :: Collection，其中包含内容的索引以及内容本身。这使开发人员可以检查是否已检索到特定项目，如果没有，则请求该内容。

trans-unit.source: The content is what is left from the original widget or subcontrol once we have removed the margin, the border, and the padding.
trans-unit.target: 内容是我们去掉 margin、border 和 padding 后,从原始 widget 或子控件中留下的内容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the document specifies its encoding to be UTF-8. If you later on convert the returned html string into a byte array for transmission over a network or when saving to disk you should use QString::toUtf8() to convert the string to a QByteArray.

trans-unit.source: The content of the image is 44 pixels wide by 32 pixels high. Every 9-patch image needs a one pixel thick line (collectively referred to as "9-patch lines") around every side, so the actual size of the image becomes 46 pixels wide by 34 pixels high. Note that the 9-patch lines must be one pixel thick regardless of the target DPI of the image. For example, the 9-patch lines for button-background.9.png and button-background@2x.9.png must both be one pixel thick.
trans-unit.target: 图像的内容是44像素宽,32像素高。每张9-patch图像的每一面都需要一条1像素厚的线(统称为 "9-patch线"),所以图像的实际尺寸变成了46像素宽,34像素高。需要注意的是,无论图像的目标DPI是多少,9条贴片线都必须是一个像素的厚度。例如,button-background.9.png和button-background@2x.9.png的9条补丁线都必须是一个像素厚。

trans-unit.source: The continuation can also take a QFuture argument (instead of its value), representing the previous future. This can be useful if, for example, QFuture has multiple results, and the user wants to access them inside the continuation. Or the user needs to handle the exception of the previous future inside the continuation, to not interrupt the chain of multiple continuations. For example:
trans-unit.target: 延续也可以采用QFuture参数（而不是其值）来表示先前的未来。例如，如果QFuture具有多个结果，并且用户希望在延续中访问它们，这将很有用。否则，用户需要处理延续中先前发生的异常，以免打断多个延续链。例如：

trans-unit.source: The continuation will be launched in in a separate thread taken from the global QThreadPool.
trans-unit.target: 延续将在一个从全局QThreadPool中获取的单独线程中启动。

trans-unit.source: The continuation will be launched in the same thread in which the parent has been executing, or in the thread where the parent lives if the continuation is attached after the parent has already finished.
trans-unit.target: 续航将在父线程一直执行的同一线程中启动,如果续航是在父线程结束后附加的,则在父线程所在的线程中启动。

trans-unit.source: The continuation will inherit the launch policy of the parent or its thread pool, if it was using a custom one.
trans-unit.target: 如果延续使用的是自定义的线程池,那么它将继承父线程或其线程池的启动策略。

trans-unit.source: The control can be specified in a variety of formats, but the fastest and most powerful format is to use the class ID (CLSID) of the object directly. The class ID can be prepended with information about a remote machine that the object should run on, and can include a license key for licensed controls.

trans-unit.source: The control type specifies the type of the widget for which this size policy applies. It is used by some styles, notably QMacStyle, to insert proper spacing between widgets. For example, the macOS Aqua guidelines specify that push buttons should be separated by 12 pixels, whereas vertically stacked radio buttons only require 6 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 控件类型指定此大小策略适用的窗口小部件的类型。某些样式（尤其是QMacStyle）使用它在小部件之间插入适当的间距。例如，macOS Aqua准则指定按钮应间隔12个像素，而垂直堆叠的单选按钮仅需要6个像素。

trans-unit.source: The control type specifies the type of the widget for which this size policy applies. It is used by some styles, notably QMacStyle, to insert proper spacing between widgets. For example, the macOS Aqua guidelines specify that push buttons should be separated by 12 pixels, whereas vertically stacked radio buttons only require 6 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 控件类型指定适用此大小策略的小组件的类型。它被一些样式(尤其是 QMacStyle)用来在小组件之间插入适当的间距。例如,macOS Aqua 指南规定,按钮之间的间距应该是 12 像素,而垂直堆叠的单选按钮只需要 6 像素。

trans-unit.source: The controller acts as a client interacting with a remote device which is in the peripheral role. The controller can initiate connections, discover services and read and write characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 控制器作为客户机与处于外设角色的远程设备交互。控制器可以发起连接,发现服务和读写特性。

trans-unit.source: The controller can be used to advertise services and handle incoming connections and client requests, acting as a GATT server. A remote device connected to the controller is in the central role.
trans-unit.target: 控制器可用于发布服务广告,处理传入的连接和客户端请求,充当GATT服务器。连接到控制器的远程设备处于中心地位。

trans-unit.source: The controls for expanding and collapsing will be shown if the item contains children.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目中包含子项目,则会显示展开和折叠的控件。

trans-unit.source: The controls for expanding and collapsing will never be shown even if there are children. If the node is forced open the user will not be able to expand or collapse the item.
trans-unit.target: 即使有子节点,也不会显示展开和折叠的控件。如果节点被强制打开,用户将无法展开或折叠该项目。

trans-unit.source: The convenience function subWindowList() returns a list of all subwindows. This information could be used in a popup menu containing a list of windows, for example.
trans-unit.target: 便捷函数subWindowList（）返回所有子窗口的列表。例如，可以在包含窗口列表的弹出菜单中使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: The convenience function capturedTexts() will return
trans-unit.target: 便捷函数captureTexts（）将返回

trans-unit.source: The convenience function value() loops over the vector and returns an attribute value for a given namespaceUri and an attribute's name.
trans-unit.target: 便捷函数值（）遍历向量，并返回给定namespaceUri的属性值和属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The convenience views (QListWidget, QTableWidget, and QTreeWidget) override the default drag and drop functionality to provide less flexible, but more natural behavior that is appropriate for many applications. For example, since it is more common to drop data into cells in a QTableWidget, replacing the existing contents with the data being transferred, the underlying model will set the data of the target items rather than insert new rows and columns into the model. For more information on drag and drop in convenience views, you can see Using drag and drop with item views.
trans-unit.target: 便利视图（QListWidget，QTableWidget和QTreeWidget）覆盖了默认的拖放功能，以提供较不灵活但更自然的行为，适用于许多应用程序。例如，由于更常见的是将数据放入QTableWidget的单元格中，将现有内容替换为要传输的数据，因此基础模型将设置目标项目的数据，而不是在模型中插入新的行和列。有关在便利视图中拖放的更多信息，请参见在项目视图中使用拖放。

trans-unit.source: The convenience views (QListWidget, QTableWidget, and QTreeWidget) override the default drag and drop functionality to provide less flexible, but more natural behavior that is appropriate for many applications. For example, since it is more common to drop data into cells in a QTableWidget, replacing the existing contents with the data being transferred, the underlying model will set the data of the target items rather than insert new rows and columns into the model. For more information on drag and drop in convenience views, you can see Using drag and drop with item views.
trans-unit.target: 便利视图（QListWidget，QTableWidget和QTreeWidget）覆盖了默认的拖放功能，以提供较不灵活但更自然的行为，适用于许多应用程序。例如，由于更常见的是将数据放入QTableWidget中的单元格中，用要传输的数据替换现有内容，因此基础模型将设置目标项目的数据，而不是在模型中插入新的行和列。有关在便利视图中拖放的更多信息，请参见在项目视图中使用拖放。

trans-unit.source: The conversion algorithm will try to find the shortest accurate representation for the given number. "Accurate" means that you get the exact same number back from an inverse conversion on the generated string representation.
trans-unit.target: 转换算法将尝试为给定的数字找到最短的精确表示。"准确 "意味着你从生成的字符串表示法上的逆向转换中得到完全相同的数字。

trans-unit.source: The conversion functions keyToValue(), valueToKey(), keysToValue(), and valueToKeys() allow conversion between the integer representation of an enumeration or set value and its literal representation. The scope() function returns the class scope this enumerator was declared in.
trans-unit.target: 转换函数keyToValue（），valueToKey（），keysToValue（）和valueToKeys（）允许在枚举或设置值的整数表示与其文字表示之间进行转换。该范围（）函数返回类范围内该枚举在声明。

trans-unit.source: The conversion functions include unicode() (to a scalar), toLatin1() (to scalar, but converts all non-Latin-1 characters to 0), row() (gives the Unicode row), cell() (gives the Unicode cell), digitValue() (gives the integer value of any of the numerous digit characters), and a host of constructors.
trans-unit.target: 转换函数包括unicode（）（转换为标量），toLatin1（）（转换为标量，但将所有非Latin-1字符转换为0），row（）（给出Unicode行），cell（）（给出Unicode单元格），digitValue（）（给出众多数字字符中任何一个的整数值）和许多构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The conversion of Qt 3D Studio projects does have some limitations due to differences in features available. Features such as Effects and CustomMaterials are not available and will not be generated. There is also some differences in how Animations are implemented, so there can be differences in behavior on conversion. The conversion process will not be 100% and it is expected that some adjustments will be necessary, but should ease the porting process for existing projects.
trans-unit.target: 由于可用功能的不同,Qt 3D Studio项目的转换确实存在一些限制。如Effects和CustomMaterials等功能是不可用的,也不会生成。动画的实现方式也有一些差异,所以在转换时的行为可能会有差异。转换过程不会是100%的,预计需要进行一些调整,但应该可以缓解现有项目的移植过程。

trans-unit.source: The cookie jar is initialized to empty.

trans-unit.source: The cookie jar is the object that holds all cookies set in previous requests. Web browsers save their cookie jars to disk in order to conserve permanent cookies across invocations of the application.
trans-unit.target: Cookie jar是保存以前请求中设置的所有Cookie的对象。网络浏览器将其cookie罐保存在磁盘上,以便在调用应用程序时保存永久cookie。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate mode of the resulting gradient is QGradient::ObjectMode, allowing the preset to be applied to arbitrary object sizes.
trans-unit.target: 生成的渐变的坐标模式为QGradient :: ObjectMode，从而允许将预设应用于任意对象大小。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate space that an application uses in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序在 "设备独立像素 "中使用的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate space the application uses (Device Independent Pixels).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用的坐标空间(设备独立像素)。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate system is controlled by the QPainter class. Together with the QPaintDevice and QPaintEngine classes, QPainter form the basis of Qt's painting system, Arthur. QPainter is used to perform drawing operations, QPaintDevice is an abstraction of a two-dimensional space that can be painted on using a QPainter, and QPaintEngine provides the interface that the painter uses to draw onto different types of devices.
trans-unit.target: 坐标系由QPainter类控制。QPainter与QPaintDevice和QPaintEngine类一起构成了Qt绘画系统Arthur的基础。QPainter用于执行绘制操作，QPaintDevice是可以使用QPainter绘制的二维空间的抽象，并且QPaintEngine提供了绘制器用来在不同类型的设备上绘制的接口。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate values should be specified using the WGS84 datum. For more information on geographical terms see this article on coordinates and another on geodetic systems including WGS84.
trans-unit.target: 坐标值应使用WGS84基准指定。有关地理术语的更多信息，请参见本文中有关坐标的文章以及有关大地测量系统（包括WGS84）的另一篇文章。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate where the icon is going to be shown. What pixel of the icon matches the coordinate is somehow backend-dependent. For example, due to limitations, some backends might associate the center of the icon with the coordinate, others one of the corners. If there is a choice, backend developers should use the center of the icon as the default anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 要显示图标的坐标。图标的哪个像素与坐标相匹配在某种程度上取决于后台。例如,由于限制,一些后台可能会将图标的中心点与坐标相关联,而另一些后台可能会将图标的某个角与坐标相关联。如果有选择,后台开发者应该使用图标的中心作为默认的锚点。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are calculated by transforming globalPosition() into the space of QInputDevice::availableVirtualGeometry(), i.e. (0, 0) is the top-left corner and (1, 1) is the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 通过将globalPosition（）转换为QInputDevice :: availableVirtualGeometry（）的空间来计算坐标，即 (0, 0) 是左上角， (1, 1) 是右下角。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are normalized to the size of the touch device, i.e. (0,0) is the top-left corner and (1,1) is the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 坐标根据触摸设备的大小进行归一化处理,即(0,0)为左上角,(1,1)为右下角。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative frame coordinates: QPointF(0,0) points to the left top frame point, QPointF(0.5,0.5) points to the frame center, which is typically the default spot metering point.
trans-unit.target: 坐标是相对的帧坐标：QPointF（0,0）指向左上框架点，QPointF（0.5,0.5）指向框架中心，通常是默认的点测光点。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative to the MouseArea.
trans-unit.target: 坐标是相对于MouseArea的。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are transformed using the following formulas:
trans-unit.target: 坐标使用以下公式进行变换。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates for the user input that should be processed by the scene as a graph position query. If this property is set to value other than invalidSelectionPoint, the graph tries to match a graph position to the given point within the primary viewport. After the rendering pass, this property is returned to its default state of invalidSelectionPoint. The queried graph position can be read from the AbstractGraph3D::queriedGraphPosition property after the next render pass.
trans-unit.target: 应该由场景处理为图形位置查询的用户输入的坐标。如果将此属性设置为invalidSelectionPoint之外的值，则图形将尝试将图形位置与主视口中的给定点进行匹配。渲染通过后，此属性返回其默认状态invalidSelectionPoint。下一个渲染过程之后，可以从AbstractGraph3D :: queriedGraphPosition属性读取查询的图形位置。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates for the user input that should be processed by the scene as a selection. If this property is set to a value other than invalidSelectionPoint, the graph tries to select a data item at the given point within the primary viewport. After the rendering pass, the property is returned to its default state of invalidSelectionPoint.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的坐标，场景应将其作为选择进行处理。如果将此属性设置为invalidSelectionPoint之外的其他值，则图形将尝试在主视口中的给定点选择数据项。渲染通过后，该属性返回其默认状态invalidSelectionPoint。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the four corners of the georectangle can be accessed with the topLeft, topRight, bottomLeft and bottomRight attributes. The center attribute can be used to get the coordinate of the center of the georectangle. The width and height attributes can be used to get the width and height of the georectangle in degrees. Setting one of these attributes will cause the other attributes to be adjusted accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用topLeft，topRight，bottomLeft和bottomRight属性访问 georectangle 四个角的坐标。该中心的属性可以用来获得的中央位置的坐标 georectangle 。的宽度和高度属性可以用于获取的宽度和高度 georectangle 度。设置这些属性之一将导致相应地调整其他属性。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the waypoints for the desired route. The waypoints should be given in order from origin to destination. Two or more coordinates are needed.
trans-unit.target: 所需路线的航点坐标。航点应按从起点到目的地的顺序排列。需要两个或多个坐标。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates should be listed in the order in which they would be traversed by someone traveling along this segment of the route.
trans-unit.target: 坐标应按沿本段路线行驶的人穿越的顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates system is the same as for custom focus points: QPointF(0,0) points to the left top frame point, QPointF(0.5,0.5) points to the frame center.
trans-unit.target: 坐标系与自定义焦点相同：QPointF（0,0）指向左上框架点，QPointF（0.5,0.5）指向框架中心。

trans-unit.source: The coordination of network operations is performed by the QNetworkAccessManager class. Once a request has been created, this class is used to dispatch it and emit signals to report on its progress. The manager also coordinates the use of cookies to store data on the client, authentication requests, and the use of proxies.
trans-unit.target: 网络操作的协调由QNetworkAccessManager类执行。创建请求后，将使用此类来分派请求并发出信号以报告其进度。管理器还协调使用Cookie来存储客户端上的数据，身份验证请求以及代理的使用。

trans-unit.source: The core Qt Gui library by default supports reading and writing image files of the most common file formats: PNG, JPEG, BMP, GIF and a few more, ref. Reading and Writing Image Files. The Qt Image Formats add-on module provides optional support for other image file formats.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，核心Qt Gui库支持读取和写入最常见文件格式的图像文件： PNG ， JPEG ， BMP ， GIF 和其他一些格式，参考。读写图像文件。“ Qt图像格式”附加模块为其他图像文件格式提供可选支持。

trans-unit.source: The core Vulkan commands are exposed via the QVulkanFunctions object, retrievable by calling QVulkanInstance::functions(). Device level functions are available after creating a VkDevice by calling QVulkanInstance::deviceFunctions().
trans-unit.target: 核心Vulkan命令通过QVulkanFunctions对象公开，可通过调用QVulkanInstance :: functions（）进行检索。通过调用QVulkanInstance :: deviceFunctions（）创建VkDevice之后，可以使用设备级功能。

trans-unit.source: The core functionality of QPainter is drawing, but the class also provide several functions that allows you to customize QPainter's settings and its rendering quality, and others that enable clipping. In addition you can control how different shapes are merged together by specifying the painter's composition mode.
trans-unit.target: QPainter的核心功能是绘图，但是该类还提供了几个功能，可让您自定义QPainter的设置及其呈现质量，以及其他一些允许剪切的功能。另外，您可以通过指定画家的构图模式来控制如何将不同的形状合并在一起。

trans-unit.source: The core functionality of QPainter is drawing, but the class also provide several functions that allows you to customize QPainter's settings and its rendering quality, and others that enable clipping. In addition you can control how different shapes are merged together by specifying the painter's composition mode.
trans-unit.target: QPainter的核心功能是绘图,但该类还提供了几个功能,允许你自定义QPainter的设置和它的渲染质量,还有一些功能可以实现剪切。此外,你还可以通过指定画家的构图模式来控制不同形状如何合并在一起。

trans-unit.source: The core help engine can be used to perform different tasks. By calling documentsForIdentifier() the engine returns URLs specifying the file locations inside the help system. The actual file data can then be retrived by calling fileData().
trans-unit.target: 核心帮助引擎可用于执行不同的任务。通过调用documentsForIdentifier（），引擎返回指定帮助系统内文件位置的URL。然后可以通过调用fileData（）检索实际的文件数据。

trans-unit.source: The core help engine can be used to perform different tasks. By calling linksForIdentifier() the engine returns URLs specifying the file locations inside the help system. The actual file data can then be retrived by calling fileData(). In contrast to all other functions in this class, linksForIdentifier() depends on the currently set custom filter. Depending on the filter, the function may return different results.
trans-unit.target: 核心帮助引擎可用于执行不同的任务。通过调用linksForIdentifier（），引擎返回指定帮助系统内文件位置的URL。然后可以通过调用fileData（）检索实际的文件数据。与此类中的所有其他函数相比，linksForIdentifier（）取决于当前设置的自定义过滤器。取决于过滤器，该函数可能返回不同的结果。

trans-unit.source: The cost strategy to use to cache decompressed map tiles in memory. Valid values are bytesize and unitary. Using bytesize, the related size parameter (esri.mapping.cache.texture.size) will be interpreted as bytes. Using unitary, they will be interpreted as number of tiles. The default value for this parameter is bytesize.
trans-unit.target: 用于在内存中缓存解压缩的地图切片的成本策略。有效值为bytesize和unitary。使用bytesize，相关的size参数（esri.mapping.cache.texture.size）将被解释为字节。使用unitary，它们将被解释为图块数。此参数的默认值为bytesize。

trans-unit.source: The created TimeStamp is normalized, i.e. microseconds greater 1000000 are converted to seconds.
trans-unit.target: 将创建的时间戳标准化，即将大于1000000的微秒转换为秒。

trans-unit.source: The created object and its creation status are available via the
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象及其创建状态可通过

trans-unit.source: The creation context of a Component corresponds to the context where the Component was declared. This context is used as the parent context (creating a context hierarchy) when the component is instantiated by an object such as a ListView or a Loader.
trans-unit.target: 组件的创建上下文与声明该组件的上下文相对应。当组件通过ListView或Loader之类的对象实例化时，此上下文用作父上下文（创建上下文层次结构）。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform Qt Network module provides classes that make local network programming portable and easy. It offers the QLocalServer and QLocalSocket classes that allow for network-like communication in a local setup. Their TCP counterparts can be used as drop-in replacement to make the communication work across networks.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台的Qt网络模块提供了使本地网络编程可移植且容易的类。它提供了QLocalServer和QLocalSocket类，它们允许在本地设置中进行类似网络的通信。它们的TCP对应对象可以用作即插即用的替代品，以使跨网络的通信正常进行。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform Qt Network module provides classes that make network programming portable and easy. It offers high-level classes (e.g. QNetworkAccessManager) that communicate using specific application-level protocols, and lower-level classes (e.g., QTcpSocket, QTcpServer, QSslSocket) for implementing protocols.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台的Qt网络模块提供了使网络编程可移植且容易的类。它提供了使用特定应用程序级别协议进行通信的高级类（例如QNetworkAccessManager），以及用于实现协议的低级类（例如QTcpSocket，QTcpServer和QSslSocket）。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform Qt Network module provides classes that make network programming portable and easy. It offers high-level classes (e.g., QNetworkAccessManager, QFtp) that communicate using specific application-level protocols, and lower-level classes (e.g., QTcpSocket, QTcpServer, QSslSocket) for implementing protocols.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台的Qt网络模块提供了使网络编程可移植且容易的类。它提供了使用特定的应用程序级协议进行通信的高层类（例如QNetworkAccessManager，QFtp），以及提供了用于实现协议的较低层的类（例如QTcpSocket，QTcpServer，QSslSocket）。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform class QProcess can be used to start external programs as child processes, and to communicate with them. It provides an API for monitoring and controlling the state of the child process. QProcess gives access to the input/output channels of child process by inheriting from QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台类QProcess可用于将外部程序作为子进程启动，并与它们进行通信。它提供了一个用于监视和控制子进程状态的API。QProcess通过继承QIODevice来访问子进程的输入/输出通道。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform class QProcess can be used to start external programs as child processes, and to communicate with them. It provides an API for monitoring and controlling the state of the child process. QProcess gives access to the input/output channels of child process by inheriting from QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台类QProcess可用于将外部程序作为子进程启动，并与它们进行通信。它提供了一个用于监视和控制子进程状态的API。QProcess通过继承QIODevice来访问子进程的输入/输出通道。

trans-unit.source: The cross-platform shared memory class, QSharedMemory, provides access to the operating system's shared memory implementation. It allows safe access to shared memory segments by multiple threads and processes. Additionally, QSystemSemaphore can be used to control access to resources shared by the system, as well as to communicate between processes.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台共享内存类QSharedMemory提供对操作系统的共享内存实现的访问。它允许通过多个线程和进程安全地访问共享内存段。此外，QSystemSemaphore可用于控制对系统共享资源的访问，以及在进程之间进行通信。

trans-unit.target: 当前窗口的Flip3D策略。

trans-unit.source: The current Map plugin in use is contained in the plugin property of the Map item. In order to display any image in a Map item, you will need to set this property. See the Plugin type for a description of how to retrieve an appropriate plugin for use.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在使用的Map插件包含在Map项的plugin属性中。为了在“地图”项中显示任何图像，您需要设置此属性。有关如何检索适当的插件以供使用的描述，请参见插件类型。

trans-unit.target: AxisSetting的当前轴

trans-unit.source: The current brush color will only have an effect for monochrome pixmaps, i.e. for QPixmap::depth() == 1 (QBitmaps).
trans-unit.target: 当前的笔刷颜色仅对单色像素图有效，即对QPixmap :: depth（）== 1（QBitmaps）有效。

trans-unit.source: The current char format's attributes are set with setFontItalic(), setFontWeight(), setFontUnderline(), setFontFamily(), setFontPointSize(), setTextColor() and setCurrentFont(). The current paragraph's alignment is set with setAlignment().

trans-unit.source: The current charge level of a battery. 100% represents fully charged while 0% represents fully discharged.
trans-unit.target: 电池当前的充电水平。100%代表完全充电,0%代表完全放电。

trans-unit.source: The current configuration includes the format, the share context, and the screen.
trans-unit.target: 当前的配置包括格式、共享上下文和屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The current deadZone radius of the AxisSetting
trans-unit.target: 在目前盲区半径AxisSetting

trans-unit.source: The current device pixel ratio that is used when mapping input coordinates to pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 将输入坐标映射到像素坐标时使用的当前设备像素比例。

trans-unit.source: The current directory is the directory containing the source files: the
trans-unit.target: 当前的目录是包含源文件的目录:。

trans-unit.source: The current element is the element matching the most recently parsed start element of which a matching end element has not yet been reached. When the parser has reached the end element, the current element becomes the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 当前元素是与最近解析的起始元素相匹配的元素,其中还没有达到匹配的结束元素。当解析器到达结束元素时,当前元素成为父元素。

trans-unit.source: The current feature support is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 目前的功能支持如下。

trans-unit.source: The current font.
trans-unit.target: 当前的字体。

trans-unit.source: The current group is automatically prepended to all keys specified to QSettings. In addition, query functions such as childGroups(), childKeys(), and allKeys() are based on the group. By default, no group is set.
trans-unit.target: 当前组自动添加到QSettings指定的所有键之前。另外，诸如childGroups（），childKeys（）和allKeys（）之类的查询功能均基于该组。默认情况下，未设置任何组。

trans-unit.source: The current height of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 当前键盘的高度。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation is based on QSettings. This imposes certain limitations, such as missing change notifications. Writing a setting value using one instance of Settings does not update the value in another Settings instance, even if they are referring to the same setting in the same category.
trans-unit.target: 当前的实现基于QSettings。这强加了某些限制，例如缺少更改通知。使用设置的一个实例写入设置值不会更新另一个设置实例中的值，即使它们引用的是同一类别中的相同设置也是如此。

trans-unit.source: The current index can change when inserting or removing items.
trans-unit.target: 在插入或删除项目时,当前的索引可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The current index is -1 if there is no current tab.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有当前标签,则当前指数为-1。

trans-unit.source: The current index is -1 if there is no current widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有当前小组件,当前指数为-1。

trans-unit.source: The current item can be used together with an anchor to specify a range that should be selected or deselected (or a combination of the two).
trans-unit.target: 当前项目可以与锚一起使用,以指定应该选择或取消选择的范围(或两者的组合)。

trans-unit.source: The current item in the list can be found with currentItem(), and changed with setCurrentItem(). The user can also change the current item by navigating with the keyboard or clicking on a different item. When the current item changes, the currentItemChanged() signal is emitted with the new current item and the item that was previously current.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的当前项目可以使用currentItem（）找到，并可以使用setCurrentItem（）进行更改。用户还可以通过使用键盘导航或单击其他项目来更改当前项目。当前项目更改时，将与新的当前项目以及以前的当前项目一起发出currentItemChanged（）信号。

trans-unit.source: The current item is indicated by the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 当前项目由焦点矩形表示。

trans-unit.source: The current item is played only once.
trans-unit.target: 当前项目只播放一次。

trans-unit.source: The current item is played repeatedly in a loop.
trans-unit.target: 循环重复播放当前项目。

trans-unit.source: The current item will be
trans-unit.target: 当前项目将是

trans-unit.source: The current item will be changed with key navigation or mouse button clicks.
trans-unit.target: 当前项目将通过按键导航或鼠标按钮点击来改变。

trans-unit.source: The current item will be edited if the edit key, F2, is pressed or the item is double-clicked (provided that editing is enabled).
trans-unit.target: 如果按下编辑键F2或双击该项目，则当前项目将被编辑（假设已启用编辑）。

trans-unit.source: The current item's text is available via the styleData.text property.
trans-unit.target: 当前项目的文本可通过 styleData.text 属性获得。

trans-unit.source: The current keyframe on the timeline. The current keyframe can be animated or a binding can be attached to it. Using bindings allows controlling the behavior of components.
trans-unit.target: 时间轴上的当前关键帧。当前的关键帧可以被动画化,也可以为其附加一个绑定。使用绑定可以控制组件的行为。

trans-unit.source: The current language is displayed on the space bar key.
trans-unit.target: 当前语言在空格键上显示。

trans-unit.source: The current language used for spellchecking is defined per profile, and can be set using the QWebEngineProfile::setSpellCheckLanguages() method or the WebEngineProfile.spellCheckLanguages property.
trans-unit.target: 用于拼写检查的当前语言是针对每个配置文件定义的，可以使用QWebEngineProfile :: setSpellCheckLanguages（）方法或WebEngineProfile.spellCheckLanguages属性进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The current lifecycle state of the page.
trans-unit.target: 当前页面的生命周期状态。

trans-unit.source: The current load progress of the web content, represented as an integer between 0 and 100.
trans-unit.target: 当前网页内容的加载进度,用0到100之间的整数表示。

trans-unit.source: The current media cannot be played. The player is in the StoppedState.
trans-unit.target: 当前媒体无法播放。播放器处于StoppedState。

trans-unit.source: The current media element's status and its available operations. MediaNone if the selected web page content is not a media element.
trans-unit.target: 当前媒体元素的状态及其可用的操作。 MediaNone (如果所选网页内容不是媒体元素）。

trans-unit.source: The current media has been loaded. The player is in the StoppedState.
trans-unit.target: 当前媒体已加载。播放器处于StoppedState。

trans-unit.source: The current media is being loaded. The player may be in any state.
trans-unit.target: 当前媒体正在加载。播放器可以处于任何状态。

trans-unit.source: The current misspelled word can be found in QWebEngineContextMenuData::misspelledWord(), and suggested replacements in QWebEngineContextMenuData::spellCheckerSuggestions().
trans-unit.target: 可以在QWebEngineContextMenuData :: misspelledWord（）中找到当前拼写错误的单词，并在QWebEngineContextMenuData :: spellCheckerSuggestions（）中找到建议的替代单词。

trans-unit.source: The current number of columns
trans-unit.target: 当前列数

trans-unit.source: The current number of rows
trans-unit.target: 当前行数

trans-unit.source: The current page index is available as currentIndex(), the current page widget with currentWidget(). You can retrieve a pointer to a page widget with a given index using widget(), and can find the index position of a widget with indexOf(). Use setCurrentWidget() or setCurrentIndex() to show a particular page.
trans-unit.target: 当前页面索引可用作currentIndex（），当前页面小部件带有currentWidget（）。您可以使用widget（）检索具有给定索引的页面widget的指针，并可以使用indexOf（）查找widget的索引位置。使用setCurrentWidget（）或setCurrentIndex（）显示特定页面。

trans-unit.source: The current path is NOT part of the drawing state. The path can be reset by invoking the beginPath() method.
trans-unit.target: 当前路径不是绘图状态的一部分。可以通过调用beginPath（）方法来重置路径。

trans-unit.source: The current profile used for the view.
trans-unit.target: 当前视图使用的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The current progress is expressed as a decimal value between 0.0 and 1.0. The time it takes for activated() to be emitted is measured in milliseconds, and can be set with the delay property.
trans-unit.target: 当前进度表示为 0.0 到 1.0 之间的十进制值。发射activated（）所花费的时间以毫秒为单位，可以用delay属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The current progress is expressed as a decimal value between 0.0 and 1.0. The time it takes for activated to be emitted is measured in milliseconds, and can be set with the delay property.
trans-unit.target: 当前进度表示为 0.0 到 1.0 之间的十进制值。激活发射所需的时间以毫秒为单位，可以使用delay属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The current progress. A value of QStyleOptionProgressBar::minimum - 1 indicates that the progress hasn't started yet. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 目前的进展。QStyleOptionProgressBar :: minimum的值-1表示进度尚未开始。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The current read/write position of the device is maintained internally by QIODevice, so reimplementing this function is not necessary. When subclassing QIODevice, use QIODevice::seek() to notify QIODevice about changes in the device position.
trans-unit.target: 设备的当前读/写位置由QIODevice在内部维护，因此无需重新实现此功能。子类化QIODevice时，请使用QIODevice :: seek（）通知QIODevice有关设备位置的更改。

trans-unit.source: The current rendering
trans-unit.target: 当前的渲染

trans-unit.source: The current row index of the view. The default value is -1 to indicate that no row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 视图的当前行索引。默认值是 -1 ，表明没有行被选中。

trans-unit.source: The current selection will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 当前的选择将被更新。

trans-unit.source: The current size policies and stretch factors be retrieved using the horizontalPolicy(), verticalPolicy(), horizontalStretch() and verticalStretch() functions. Alternatively, use the transpose() function to swap the horizontal and vertical policies and stretches. The hasHeightForWidth() function returns the current status of the flag indicating the size hint dependencies.

trans-unit.source: The current style, which is used to render the content of all standard Qt widgets, is free to choose colors and brushes from the widget palette, or in some cases, to ignore the palette (partially, or completely). In particular, certain styles like GTK style, Mac style, and Windows Vista style, depend on third party APIs to render the content of widgets, and these styles typically do not follow the palette. Because of this, assigning roles to a widget's palette is not guaranteed to change the appearance of the widget. Instead, you may choose to apply a styleSheet.
trans-unit.target: 当前样式用于呈现所有标准Qt小部件的内容，可以自由地从小部件调色板中选择颜色和画笔，或者在某些情况下可以忽略调色板（部分或全部）。特别是，某些样式（例如GTK样式，Mac样式和Windows Vista样式）依赖于第三方API来呈现窗口小部件的内容，并且这些样式通常不遵循调色板。因此，不能保证将角色分配给窗口小部件的调色板会更改窗口小部件的外观。相反，您可以选择应用styleSheet。

trans-unit.source: The current style, which is used to render the content of all standard Qt widgets, is free to choose colors and brushes from the widget palette, or in some cases, to ignore the palette (partially, or completely). In particular, certain styles like GTK style, Mac style, and Windows Vista style, depend on third party APIs to render the content of widgets, and these styles typically do not follow the palette. Because of this, assigning roles to a widget's palette is not guaranteed to change the appearance of the widget. Instead, you may choose to apply a styleSheet.
trans-unit.target: 当前样式用于呈现所有标准Qt小部件的内容，可以自由地从小部件调色板中选择颜色和画笔，或者在某些情况下可以忽略调色板（部分或全部）。特别是，某些样式（例如GTK样式，Mac样式和Windows Vista样式）依赖于第三方API来呈现窗口小部件的内容，并且这些样式通常不遵循调色板。因此，不能保证将角色分配给窗口小部件的调色板会更改窗口小部件的外观。相反，您可以选择应用styleSheet。

trans-unit.source: The current style, which is used to render the content of all standard Qt widgets, is free to choose to use the widget font, or in some cases, to ignore it (partially, or completely). In particular, certain styles like GTK style, Mac style, and Windows Vista style, apply special modifications to the widget font to match the platform's native look and feel. Because of this, assigning properties to a widget's font is not guaranteed to change the appearance of the widget. Instead, you may choose to apply a styleSheet.
trans-unit.target: 当前样式用于呈现所有标准Qt小部件的内容，可以自由选择使用小部件字体，或者在某些情况下可以忽略（部分或完全）它。特别是，某些样式（例如GTK样式，Mac样式和Windows Vista样式）对小部件字体进行了特殊修改，以匹配平台的本机外观。因此，不能保证将属性分配给窗口小部件的字体会更改窗口小部件的外观。相反，您可以选择应用styleSheet。

trans-unit.source: The current version of QByteArray is limited to just under 2 GB (2^31 bytes) in size. The exact value is architecture-dependent, since it depends on the overhead required for managing the data block, but is no more than 32 bytes. Raw data blocks are also limited by the use of int type in the current version to 2 GB minus 1 byte.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本的QByteArray的大小限制在2 GB（2 ^ 31字节）以下。确切的值取决于体系结构，因为它取决于管理数据块所需的开销，但不超过32个字节。原始数据块还受当前版本中使用 int 类型限制为2 GB减去1个字节。

trans-unit.source: The current version of QString is limited to just under 2 GB (2^31 bytes) in size. The exact value is architecture-dependent, since it depends on the overhead required for managing the data block, but is no more than 32 bytes. Raw data blocks are also limited by the use of int type in the current version to 2 GB minus 1 byte. Since QString uses two bytes per character, that translates to just under 2^30 characters in one QString.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本的QString的大小被限制在2 GB（2 ^ 31字节）以下。确切的值取决于体系结构，因为它取决于管理数据块所需的开销，但不超过32个字节。原始数据块还受当前版本中使用 int 类型限制为2 GB减去1个字节。由于QString每个字符使用两个字节，因此在一个QString中转换为不足2 ^ 30个字符。

trans-unit.source: The current version of QVector is limited to just under 2 GB (2^31 bytes) in size. The exact value is architecture-dependent, since it depends on the overhead required for managing the data block, but is no more than 32 bytes. The number of elements that can be stored in a QVector is that size divided by the size of each element.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本的QVector的大小被限制在2 GB（2 ^ 31字节）以下。确切的值取决于体系结构，因为它取决于管理数据块所需的开销，但不超过32个字节。可以存储在QVector中的元素数量是该大小除以每个元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: The custom fragment shader code can freely access uniforms (such as, CAMERA_DIRECTION or CAMERA_POSITION), and varyings passed on from the custom vertex shader. Additionally, there are a number of built-in varyings available as special keywords. Some of these are optional in the sense that a vertex MAIN could calculate and pass on these on its own, but to reduce duplicated data fragment shaders can also rely on these built-ins instead. These built-ins are available in light processor functions and in the fragment MAIN.
trans-unit.target: 自定义片段着色器代码可以自由访问制服（例如 CAMERA_DIRECTION 或 CAMERA_POSITION ），以及从自定义顶点着色器传递来的变化。此外，还有许多内置变体可以用作特殊关键字。从顶点 MAIN 可以自行计算并传递这些意义上讲，其中一些是可选的，但是要减少重复的数据片段着色器，也可以依赖于这些内置函数。这些内置函数可用于灯光处理器功能和片段MAIN中。

trans-unit.source: The custom implementation is responsible for opening the socket, instanciation of a potentially required QSocketNotifier and the application of custom and default QCanBusDevice::configurationParameter().
trans-unit.target: 定制实现负责打开套接字，实例化可能需要的QSocketNotifier以及定制和默认QCanBusDevice :: configurationParameter（）的应用。

trans-unit.source: The custom material allows the user of QtQuick3D to access its material library and implement own materials. There are two types of custom materials, which differ on how they are using the material library. First one uses the custom material interface provided by the library to implement materials similarly to many of the materials in the material library without implementing it's own main function. This type of material must implement all the required functions of the material. The second type implements it's own main function, but can still use functionality from the material library. See reference on how to implement the material using the material interface.
trans-unit.target: 自定义材料允许QtQuick3D的用户访问其材料库并实现自己的材料。有两种类型的自定义材料，它们在使用材料库的方式上有所不同。第一个使用库提供的自定义材料接口来实现类似于材料库中许多材料的材料，但不实现其自身的主要功能。这种类型的材料必须实现该材料的所有必需功能。第二种类型实现了它自己的主要功能，但仍可以使用材料库中的功能。请参阅有关如何使用物料接口实现物料的参考。

trans-unit.source: The custom material allows using custom shader code for a material, enabling programmability on graphics shader level. A vertex, fragment, or both shaders can be provided. The vertexShader and fragmentShader properties are URLs, referencing files containing shader snippets, and work very similarly to ShaderEffect or Image.source. Only the file and qrc schemes are supported with custom materials. It is also possible to omit the file scheme, allowing to specify a relative path in a convenient way. Such a path is resolved relative to the component's (the .qml file's) location.
trans-unit.target: 自定义材质允许对材质使用自定义着色器代码，从而实现图形着色器级别的可编程性。可以提供顶点，片段或两个着色器。该vertexShader和fragmentShader性质的网址，引用包含着色器的片段文件，并且工作非常相似ShaderEffect或Image.source。只有 file 和 qrc 方案与定制材料支持。也可以省略 file 方案，从而允许以方便的方式指定相对路径。相对于组件（ .qml 文件）的位置来解析这样的路径。

trans-unit.source: The custom materials API has been completely reworked in 6.0. This means any existing custom materials will have to be substantially rewritten. See the CustomMaterial documentation for details of the new API.
trans-unit.target: 自定义材料API已在6.0中进行了完全重新设计。这意味着任何现有的定制材料都必须进行实质性的重写。有关新API的详细信息，请参见CustomMaterial文档。

trans-unit.source: The data is always uploaded. This means that the user does not need to explicitly mark index and vertex data as dirty after changing it. This is the default.

trans-unit.source: The data is complete.

trans-unit.source: The data is drawn as a series of horizontal bars grouped by category, with one bar per category from each bar set added to the series.
trans-unit.target: 数据被绘制成一系列按类别分组的水平条形图,每组条形图中的每个类别都有一个条形图添加到系列中。

trans-unit.source: The data is drawn as a series of uniformly sized horizontally stacked bars, with one bar per category. Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar. The segment size corresponds to the percentage of the segment value compared with the total value of all segments in the stack. Bars with zero value are not drawn.
trans-unit.target: 数据被画成一系列大小均匀的水平堆叠条形图,每个类别有一个条形图。添加到系列中的每一个条形集都为每一个堆叠的条形集贡献一个片段。段的大小对应于段值与堆叠中所有段的总值的百分比。价值为零的条形图不被绘制。

trans-unit.source: The data is drawn as a series of uniformly sized vertically stacked bars, with one bar per category. Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar. The segment size corresponds to the percentage of the segment value compared with the total value of all segments in the stack. Bars with zero value are not drawn.
trans-unit.target: 数据被画成一系列大小均匀的垂直堆叠的条形图,每个类别有一个条形图。添加到系列中的每一个条形集都为每个堆叠的条形集贡献一个段。段的大小对应于段值与堆叠中所有段的总值的百分比。价值为零的条形图不被绘制。

trans-unit.source: The data is drawn as a series of vertical bars grouped by category, with one bar per category from each bar set added to the series.
trans-unit.target: 数据被绘制成一系列按类别分组的垂直条形图,每组条形图中的每个类别都有一个条形图添加到系列中。

trans-unit.source: The data is loaded immediately; external objects are loaded asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 数据立即加载,外部对象异步加载。

trans-unit.source: The data is modified for almost every time it is drawn. This is a hint that may provide better performance. When set, the user must make sure to mark the data as dirty after changing it.
trans-unit.target: 几乎每次绘制数据都要修改。这是一个可能提供更好性能的提示。设置时,用户必须确保在更改数据后将其标记为脏。

trans-unit.source: The data is modified once and drawn many times. This is a hint that may provide better performance. When set the user must make sure to mark the data as dirty after changing it.

trans-unit.source: The data is modified repeatedly and drawn many times. This is a hint that may provide better performance. When set the user must make sure to mark the data as dirty after changing it.
trans-unit.target: 数据反复修改,多次绘制。这是一个可能提供更好性能的提示。设置时,用户必须确保在更改数据后将其标记为脏。

trans-unit.source: The data is resolved asynchronously whenever mappings or the model changes. QBarDataProxy::arrayReset() is emitted when the data has been resolved. However, when useModelCategories property is set to true, single item changes are resolved synchronously, unless the same frame also contains a change that causes the whole model to be resolved.

trans-unit.source: The data of an item in a DelegateModelGroup can be accessed using the get() function, which returns information about group membership and indexes as well as model data. In combination with the move() function this can be used to implement view sorting, with remove() to filter items out of a view, or with setGroups() and Package delegates to categorize items into different views. Different groups can only be sorted independently if they are disjunct. Moving an item in one group will also move it in all other groups it is a part of.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用get（）函数访问DelegateModelGroup中项目的数据，该函数返回有关组成员资格和索引以及模型数据的信息。与move（）函数结合使用时，可用于实现视图排序，remove（）可以将视图中的项目过滤掉，或者setSets（）和Package委托将项目分类到不同的视图中。如果不同的组是分离的，则只能对其进行独立排序。将一个项目移动到一个组中也会将它移动到它所属的所有其他组中。

trans-unit.source: The data string is set with setData() and retrieved with data(). You can retrieve a portion of the data string using substringData(). Extra data can be appended with appendData(), or inserted with insertData(). Portions of the data string can be deleted with deleteData() or replaced with replaceData(). The length of the data string is returned by length().
trans-unit.target: 数据字符串使用setData（）设置，并使用data（）检索。您可以使用substringData（）检索数据字符串的一部分。多余的数据可以附加到appendData（）或插入insertData（）。数据串的部分可以与被删除deleteData（）或具有取代replaceData（）。数据字符串的长度由length（）返回。

trans-unit.source: The data that users wish to visualize comes in many formats, all of which cannot obviously be directly supported. Therefore, Qt Data Visualization implements data proxies into which user can feed their data in a known format. Each visualization type has a basic proxy type, which takes data in a format suitable for that visualization. For example, the basic proxy for QBar3DSeries is QBarDataProxy, which stores rows of QBarDataItem objects. Each QBarDataItem stores a single bar value. Additional typedefs are provided for QBarDataArray and QBarDataRow containers.
trans-unit.target: 用户希望可视化的数据有多种格式，显然不能直接支持所有这些格式。因此，Qt Data Visualization实现了数据代理，用户可以以已知格式将其数据馈入其中。每种可视化类型都有一个基本的代理类型，它以适合于该可视化的格式获取数据。例如，QBar3DSeries的基本代理是QBarDataProxy，它存储QBarDataItem对象的行。每个QBarDataItem存储单个条形值。为 QBarDataArray 和 QBarDataRow 容器提供了附加的typedef 。

trans-unit.source: The data to be inserted into the model is treated differently depending on whether it is dropped onto an existing item or not. In this simple example, we want to allow drops between existing items, before the first item in the list, and after the last item.
trans-unit.target: 插入到模型中的数据根据其是否落在现有项目上而被不同的处理。在这个简单的例子中,我们希望允许在现有项目之间、列表中第一个项目之前和最后一个项目之后插入数据。

trans-unit.source: The data to be rendered as a decoration in the form of an icon. (QColor, QIcon or QPixmap)
trans-unit.target: 以图标形式呈现为装饰的数据。（QColor，QIcon或QPixmap）

trans-unit.source: The data to be rendered in form of text.
trans-unit.target: 要以文本形式呈现的数据。

trans-unit.target: 通过拖放操作要传输的数据包含在QMimeData对象中。使用setMimeData（）函数以以下方式指定此名称：

trans-unit.source: The data types used by the property sheet for some properties are opaque custom QVariant types containing additional information instead of plain Qt data types. For example, this is the case for enumerations, flags, icons, pixmaps and strings.
trans-unit.target: 属性表用于某些属性的数据类型是不透明的自定义QVariant类型，其中包含附加信息，而不是普通的Qt数据类型。例如，枚举，标志，图标，像素图和字符串就是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The data types used by the property sheet for some properties are opaque custom QVariant types containing additional information instead of plain Qt data types. For example, this is the case for enumerations, flags, icons, pixmaps and strings.
trans-unit.target: 属性表用于某些属性的数据类型是不透明的自定义QVariant类型，其中包含附加信息，而不是普通的Qt数据类型。例如，枚举，标志，图标，像素图和字符串就是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The data will be drawn differently depending on which role they have in the model. The following table describes the roles and the data types the delegate can handle for each of them. It is often sufficient to ensure that the model returns appropriate data for each of the roles to determine the appearance of items in views.
trans-unit.target: 根据它们在模型中的角色,数据的绘制方式将有所不同。下表描述了角色和委托人可以为每个角色处理的数据类型。通常只要确保模型为每个角色返回适当的数据,以确定视图中项的外观即可。

trans-unit.source: The data will be modified repeatedly and used many times for drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: 数据会被反复修改,多次用于绘图操作。

trans-unit.source: The data will be modified repeatedly and used many times for reading data back from the OpenGL server for use in further drawing operations. Not supported under OpenGL/ES.
trans-unit.target: 该数据将被反复修改,并多次用于从OpenGL服务器读取数据回来,用于进一步的绘图操作。OpenGL/ES下不支持。

trans-unit.source: The data will be modified repeatedly and used many times for reading data back from the OpenGL server. Not supported under OpenGL/ES.
trans-unit.target: 数据将被反复修改,并多次用于从OpenGL服务器读取数据回来。OpenGL/ES下不支持。

trans-unit.source: The data will be set once and used a few times for drawing operations. Under OpenGL/ES 1.1 this is identical to StaticDraw.
trans-unit.target: 该数据将被设置一次,并在绘图操作中使用几次。在OpenGL/ES 1.1下,这和StaticDraw是一样的。

trans-unit.source: The data will be set once and used a few times for reading data back from the OpenGL server for use in further drawing operations. Not supported under OpenGL/ES.
trans-unit.target: 该数据将被设置一次,并多次用于从OpenGL服务器读取数据回来,以便在进一步的绘图操作中使用。OpenGL/ES下不支持。

trans-unit.source: The data will be set once and used a few times for reading data back from the OpenGL server. Not supported under OpenGL/ES.
trans-unit.target: 该数据将被设置一次,并多次用于从OpenGL服务器读取数据回来。OpenGL/ES下不支持。

trans-unit.source: The data will be set once and used many times for drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: 该数据将被设置一次,并多次用于绘图操作。

trans-unit.source: The database connection is referred to by
trans-unit.target: 数据库连接由

trans-unit.source: The database driver couldn't determine whether the field is required or optional.
trans-unit.target: 数据库驱动程序无法确定该字段是必填还是可选。

trans-unit.source: The database must be open when this function is called. All subscribed event notifications are automatically unsubscribed from when the close() function is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数时必须打开数据库。当调用close（）函数时，所有已订阅的事件通知都会自动取消订阅。

trans-unit.source: The database must be open when this function is called. When the database is closed by calling close() all subscribed event notifications are automatically unsubscribed. Note that calling open() on an already open database may implicitly cause close() to be called, which will cause the driver to unsubscribe from all event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数时必须打开数据库。通过调用close（）关闭数据库时，所有已订阅的事件通知都将自动取消订阅。请注意，在已经打开的数据库上调用open（）可能会隐式导致调用close（），这将导致驱动程序取消订阅所有事件通知。

trans-unit.source: The datagram was larger than the operating system's limit (which can be as low as 8192 bytes).
trans-unit.target: 数据报大于操作系统的限制(可以低至8192字节)。

trans-unit.target: 报告该职位的日期和时间;
